items.name: Item: Fiction
items.instructions: Follow the instructions and make good choices. Good luck.
items.fictionyarn:
title: Start
---
<<declare $found_cat = false>>
<<declare $talked_to_tree = false>>
<<declare $talked_to_frog = false>>
<<declare $talked_to_soldier = false>>

Player: My name is Aria. I am a young wizard with short black hair and blue eyes.
Player: My white cat, Snowball, has run into the forest.
Player: I must find her!

-> Go into the forest
    <<jump ForestEntrance>>

===
title: ForestEntrance
---
Player: I am at the entrance of the forest. It is dark and mysterious.

-> Call for Snowball
    <<jump CallForSnowball>>
-> Walk deeper into the forest
    <<jump DeeperIntoForest>>

===
title: CallForSnowball
---
Player: "Snowball! Where are you?"
Narrator: You hear a rustling in the trees.

-> Investigate the sound
    <<jump TalkingTree>>
-> Ignore it and walk deeper
    <<jump DeeperIntoForest>>

===
title: DeeperIntoForest
---
Player: I walk deeper into the forest. It is quiet.

-> Look around
    <<jump LookAround>>
-> Keep walking
    <<jump FrogPrince>>

===
title: TalkingTree
---
<<set $talked_to_tree = true>>
Tree: Hello, young wizard. I am a talking tree.
Player: Have you seen my cat, Snowball?
Tree: I saw a white cat running towards the pond.

-> Thank the tree and go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>
-> Ask more questions
    <<jump AskTreeQuestions>>

===
title: AskTreeQuestions
---
Player: Do you know anything else about the forest?
Tree: Be careful of the frog prince. He likes to play tricks.

-> Thank the tree and go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>
-> Go back to the forest entrance
    <<jump ForestEntrance>>

===
title: LookAround
---
Narrator: You see a frog sitting on a rock.

-> Talk to the frog
    <<jump FrogPrince>>
-> Ignore the frog and keep walking
    <<jump SoldierEncounter>>

===
title: FrogPrince
---
<<set $talked_to_frog = true>>
Frog: Hello, I am a frog prince.
Player: Have you seen my cat, Snowball?
Frog: I saw her near the pond, trying to catch fish.

-> Thank the frog and go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>
-> Ask the frog about his story
    <<jump FrogStory>>

===
title: FrogStory
---
Player: How did you become a frog?
Frog: A witch turned me into a frog. I need a kiss to become a prince again.

-> Offer to help
    <<jump OfferHelpFrog>>
-> Go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>

===
title: OfferHelpFrog
---
Player: I will help you, but first I must find my cat.
Frog: Thank you, young wizard.

-> Go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>

===
title: SoldierEncounter
---
<<set $talked_to_soldier = true>>
Soldier: Halt! Who goes there?
Player: I am Aria, looking for my cat.
Soldier: I saw a white cat near the pond.

-> Thank the soldier and go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>
-> Ask the soldier about the forest
    <<jump AskSoldierQuestions>>

===
title: AskSoldierQuestions
---
Player: Is there anything I should know about the forest?
Soldier: Beware of the talking tree. It likes to confuse travelers.

-> Thank the soldier and go to the pond
    <<jump Pond>>
-> Go back to the forest entrance
    <<jump ForestEntrance>>

===
title: Pond
---
Narrator: You arrive at the pond. You see Snowball trying to catch fish.
Player: "Snowball! There you are!"
<<set $found_cat = true>>

-> Pick up Snowball and go home
    <<jump TheEnd>>
-> Watch Snowball for a moment
    <<jump WatchSnowball>>

===
title: WatchSnowball
---
Player: I watch Snowball play. She is so happy.

-> Pick up Snowball and go home
    <<jump TheEnd>>

===
title: TheEnd
---
Narrator: You found Snowball and returned home safely.
Player: I am glad to have you back, Snowball.
Narrator: THE END

===
